contest-event.event-date:
July 18, 1936 D Oldham Contest
Oldham Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
oldham-contest-1
Own Choice from a Specified List
Drill Hall, Oldham, Lancashire Test piece - choice of Lorenzo or Northern Rhapsody. March contest - 1st Milnrow, 2nd Oldham Postal. 15th annual contest promoted on behalf of Oldham Royal Infirmary. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 26, 2013, 12:20 p.m. Feb. 17, 2016, 9:36 a.m.
1 Bickershaw Colliery William Haydock
2 Marsden Silver Prize Band Robert Cooper
3 Milnrow Band A. Goddard
4 Oldham RBL Concert Band Robert Cooper
5 Hollinwood & District William Brophy
